[{{< meta title >}} Brand Guidelines]({{< meta link >}})

![Home Depot (Foundation) Colors and Typography](home-depot-foundation.png)

```{.yaml filename="_brand.yml"}
meta:
  name: Home Depot
  link: https://homedepot.com

color:
  palette:
    orange: "#F96302"
    white: "#FFFFFF"
    black: "#000000"
    warm-gray-light: "#F5F5F5"
    warm-gray-dark: "#747474"
    warm-gray-medium: "#C4C4C4"
  theme:
    foreground: black
    background: white
    primary: orange
    secondary: warm-gray-dark
    light: warm-gray-light
    dark: warm-gray-dark

typography:
  fonts:
    - family: Helvetica Neue LT Pro
      source: file
      files:
        - path: HelveticaNeueLTPro.ttf
        - path: HelveticaNeueLTPro-Bold.ttf
          weight: bold
    - family: Helvetica Neue LT Pro Condensed
      source: file
      files:
        - path: HelveticaNeueLTPro-Cond-Bold.ttf
          weight: bold
  body: Helvetica Neue LT Pro
  headings: Helvetica Neue LT Pro Condensed
```
